channel.title: (317) Compile Error (317)
channel.description:
So this still hasent been fixed im starting to be annoyed... I got a error with <flag> & <Source Path>? Or something...
Once again this is what it looks like:
[img]http://i958.photobucket.com/albums/ae65/Rigsy_2010/Untitled-4.png[/img]
And again the compile in edit:
[code]@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
Please help this has not been solved! I really need this to be solved.. Btw the compile is in the client.. its a client problem.. if i didnt tell you.

item.title: (317) Compile Error (317)
item.dc:creator: @Rigsy Rigsy
item.description:
@Rigsy wrote:

I Vain I:

If you’re using a packed source, you need to compile all sub-directories.

Can you give me a mini tutioral plz? on how to do that?

Read full topic

item.title: (317) Compile Error (317)
item.dc:creator: @Rigsy Rigsy
item.description:
@Rigsy wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=rash link=topic=470518.msg3440473#msg3440473 date=1293058297]
RESET YOUR PATHS
[/quote]His path has nothing to do with this, as it’s not using a variable for Javac. It’s using a direct path.

@OP; are you using a packaged source?[/quote]

Yes… I figure thats the problem… its having problems connecting… because there in the same folder and it has something to do with the clients, and the source’s class and javas files combinding and creating a big error?

Read full topic

item.title: (317) Compile Error (317)
item.dc:creator: @Rigsy Rigsy
item.description:
@Rigsy wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Anc13nts253 link=topic=470518.msg3440439#msg3440439 date=1293056520]
It’s trying to compile the files in a folder named “Java”
[/quote]Sorry, but you’re wrong.

@OP; it’s trying to compile inside a directory with no Java class files.[/quote]

So can you please help!? i still havent got it fixed

Read full topic
